String.string: Please get samples of the {@creature:46#7001$$tholzak emitter} for me.
Thanks a lot for bringing the samples.
Find and break the {@creature:46#7001$$tholzak emitter} in the {@Rgn:46018$$Three Towers Upper Level} and collect tholzak emitter element.
Go to the {@Rgn:46019$$Beastroar Chamber} and deliver the tholzak emitter elements to {@creature:246#1025$$Alecian}.
